column5: Welcome to your home away from home!   We are opening up our entire second floor to friendly guests. Your stay will include two bedrooms, a two sink guest bathroom, game room, media room, and workout room.   We will also provide cable access, snacks, and 5G wifi.   Our home is on the Grand Prairie/Mansfield border of Dallas-Fort Worth. We are also just a couple of miles away from Joe Pool Lake! The AT&T Stadium is 16 miles away and approximately 20 miles from downtown Dallas.
